Made by erdelf, updated by LoonyLadle for 1.0.
/This is a reupload of https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1402978842 as it vanished. This only exists so people who were using it can continue to use their saves with no errors. This will be taken down at the request of the original author or return of the mod.
